description:
Lamont Cranston (Alec Baldwin) embraces the darkness and becomes The Shadow in seconds.

In this thrilling adventure, Lamont Cranston—once a man lost in darkness—embraces his destiny as The Shadow. With mind-bending powers and a mission to fight crime, he becomes the unseen protector against forces that threaten the city.

© 1994 Universal City Studios, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
Cast: Alec Baldwin, John Lone, Penelope Ann Miller, Peter Boyle, Ian McKellen, Jonathan Winters, Tim Curry, Sab Shimono, André Gregory, James Hong
Produced By: Martin Bregman
Directed By: Russell Mulcahy
